rules_text:
Gain control of target artifact, creature, or planeswalker if its mana value is 4 or less or if you cast A Sucker for You from a graveyard.
Reconstruct {9}{U}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
